desc: Our all-natural healing creams are made with essential oils that help to soothe muscle and joint pain and improve their function. For Amputees, we have an Anti-Friction Cream that provides relief from the skin problems commonly associated with prosthetics.

layout.text: FIGHT OFF INFLAMMATION AND PAIN WITH OUR PERFORMANCE CREAMS AND GET BACK TO WHAT MATTERS MOST - LIVING YOUR LIFE LIKE YOU WANT TO
